scripts.deploy-dev: npm run deploy-lambdas-dev && npm run deploy-server-dev
scripts.deploy-lambdas-dev: rm -rf node_modules && npm install --production && sls deploy && npm install
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run deploy-lambdas-prod && npm run deploy-server-prod
scripts.deploy-lambdas-prod: rm -rf node_modules && npm install --production && sls deploy --stage production && npm install
